background: A food delivery person can work shifts on either bikes or scooters, with different numbers of orders delivered, energy required, and tips earned for each. They have limited shifts and energy per month, and a minimum order and scooter shift requirement.

parameters.definition: Orders delivered on a bike shift
Energy consumed on a bike shift
Tips received on a bike shift
Orders delivered on a scooter shift
Energy consumed on a scooter shift
Tips received on a scooter shift

constraints.description: Total number of shifts (bike and scooter) must be non-negative
constraints.code:
# Add constraint to ensure the total number of shifts is non-negative
model.addConstr(BikeShifts + ScooterShifts >= 0, name="non_negative_shifts")

constraints.description: The number of bike shifts worked in a month must be non-negative
constraints.code:
# The number of bike shifts worked in a month must be non-negative
model.addConstr(BikeShifts >= 0, name="non_negative_bike_shifts")

constraints.description: The number of scooter shifts worked in a month must be non-negative
constraints.code: # No code needed since the variable 'ScooterShifts' is already defined as non-negative by setting the variable type to INTEGER

constraints.description: Total number of shifts worked in a month is at most the TotalShifts available
constraints.code:
# Total number of shifts constraint
model.addConstr(BikeShifts + ScooterShifts <= TotalShifts, name="total_shifts_limit")

constraints.description: Total energy used by all shifts must not exceed the available total energy.
constraints.code:
# Total energy used by all shifts must not exceed the available total energy
model.addConstr(EnergyBike * BikeShifts + EnergyScooter * ScooterShifts <= TotalEnergy, name="total_energy")

constraints.description: Total number of orders delivered must be at least MinOrders
constraints.code:
# Add constraint for minimum orders
model.addConstr(BikeShifts * OrdersBike + ScooterShifts * OrdersScooter >= MinOrders, name="min_orders")

constraints.description: The number of scooter shifts must meet the minimum requirement
constraints.code:
# Ensure the number of scooter shifts meets the minimum requirement
model.addConstr(ScooterShifts >= MinScooterShifts, name="min_scooter_shifts")

constraints.description: The total number of shifts worked must not exceed the total available shifts per month
constraints.code:
# Constrain the total number of shifts to not exceed the total available shifts per month
model.addConstr(BikeShifts + ScooterShifts <= TotalShifts, name="total_shift_constraint")

constraints.description: The total energy consumed must not exceed the total energy available
constraints.code:
# Energy consumption constraint
model.addConstr(EnergyBike * BikeShifts + EnergyScooter * ScooterShifts <= TotalEnergy, name="total_energy_constraint")

constraints.description: The total orders delivered must meet or exceed the minimum order requirement
constraints.code:
# The total orders delivered must meet or exceed the minimum order requirement
model.addConstr(OrdersBike * BikeShifts + OrdersScooter * ScooterShifts >= MinOrders, name="min_order_requirement")

constraints.description: The number of scooter shifts must meet or exceed the minimum scooter shift requirement
constraints.code:
# Constraint: The number of scooter shifts must meet or exceed the minimum scooter shift requirement
model.addConstr(ScooterShifts >= MinScooterShifts, name="min_scooter_shifts_req")

variables.definition: Number of bike shifts worked in a month
Number of scooter shifts worked in a month

objective.description: Maximize the total tips received from working bike and scooter shifts in a month
objective.code:
# Set objective
model.setObjective(TipsBike * BikeShifts + TipsScooter * ScooterShifts, gp.GRB.MAXIMIZE)
